title: Satay sauce

preparations.content: Place peanuts and sesame oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>12 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add garlic, palm sugar, fish sauce and soy sauce and mix <b>30 sec/speed 3<b>. Scrape the bottom and sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add lemon juice, chilli and coconut milk and mix <b>1 min/speed 4<b>. Transfer into a sealable container. Serve warm or place into refrigerator until ready to use (see Tips).

hintsAndTricks: You can store this sauce in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
This sauce can be frozen in ice cube trays for up to 2 weeks. To use, transfer frozen sauce into the refrigerator for approx. 10 hours, until thawed; then serve as desired.
